subject: biology
title: Microbes and Their Characteristics MCQ Problems

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Which feature is absent in bacteria?
problems.detailed: Option A is correct, because the nucleus has a double membrane. DNA is not contained in any prokaryote (bacteria included).

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: The main structural molecule in bacterial cell walls is:
problems.hint: Chitin is found in the exoskeleton of insects.
problems.detailed: Peptidoglycan is found in bacterial cell walls.

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Which reproductive method is typical of bacteria?
problems.hint: Budding is used for asexual reproduction in PLANTS.
problems.detailed: Binary fission is the correct mode of reproduction in bacteria.

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: What substance gives fungal cell walls their strength?
problems.hint: Remember: “Peptidoglycan is found in bacterial cell walls. Are fungi bacteria?
problems.detailed: The correct answer is option C. Chitin is found in fungal cell walls and gives them their strength.

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Protozoa often protect themselves with a flexible:
problems.hint: A capsid is the protein shell of a virus.
problems.detailed: The correct answer is B. The pellicle is a non-rigid outser layer allowing the protozia to maintain flexibility.

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Which organisms contribute directly to global oxygen production through photosynthesis?
problems.hint: Prions are misfolded proteins thought to contribute to neurodegenerative diseases.
problems.detailed: Option B is correct, algae perform photosynthesis and thus produce oxygen.

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Which infectious agent contains only protein with no nucleic acids?
problems.detailed: Prions are misfolded proteins and agents of disease. No nucleic acids involved.

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Which organisms lack any cellular structure entirely?
problems.hint: Which of these is actually a cell or is just a component of a cell?
problems.detailed: Prions are the correct answer because they are nothing more than misfolded proteins.

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Which microbe type contributes to nitrogen fixation in ecosystems?
problems.detailed: The correct answer is bacteria (nitrogen fixing bacteria).

problems.author: Kotryna Mieldažytė
problems.question: Which group has some members with silica in their walls?
problems.hint: Silica is a crystal-like, glittery substance (resembling glass).
problems.detailed: Algae are coated with silica to help with oxygen production.
